name: The Cabin (DEMO)
description:
Im Stuck. Stuck in an endless world. Everything repeats. Send help

Hi there! I am Tyler, or more commonly known as xXSlashhandXx online. I recently bought a cabin, and I am willing to spend my money to furnish it up in order for you! the user to buy. Or, not buy exactly, Because you can stay a while for free! I would like it if you donated to us to help with the renovation procedure, but its entirely optional! So if you want a fun camping experience with a lake, hiking trail, caves, and abandoned homes for you to explore

We are not responsible if you die by starvation, dehydration, infectious bite, being taken to hell, nuclear explosion, being taken to a secret realm, being torn apart brutally by tendrils protruding from a humanoid figure, and freezing to death.

This is  a demon version of the game, "The Cabin". This demo includes infinite nights (because they don't mean anything) and one Monster Den, (More specifically, Icare's Ice Den)
